column4: anyone know how to fix the bug with vsftpd not starting right in ubuntu?
anyone have any luck getting vsftpd to run correctly?
Ubuntu 11.10 and vsftpd.. well, I am still checking
I have 11.10 and whatever version of vsftpd is installed in the repos and here is the error I get when I try and start it: http://pastebin.com/iV3gyQR5
how did you determine the version and how did you instlal it?
I typed "vsftpd -version" to get the version number. I did "sudo apt-get install vsftpd" to install it. It was last year when I installed it though.
Can you paste what you get when you type "ps aux | grep vsftpd" please?
Are you using the newest vsftpd version?
Well if vsftpd wont start up, how will sftp work?
cause ssh is already running.  I just logged into sftp without any issues.
